comments.body: Does this change require removing the `$`s or is this an unrelated change because they are redundant?
This is unrelated, it just so happened I found them while testing. They are redundant.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +23,27 @@        with splitAmount : Decimal
        do
          f <- create this with amount = splitAmount
          s <- create this with amount = amount - splitAmount
          return (f, s)
